heroData.title: Fresh & Pure Dairy Products
heroData.subtitle: Bringing nature’s goodness straight from our farms to your home.

aboutData.title: About Aavin
aboutData.description: Aavin is the Tamil Nadu Cooperative Milk Producers’ Federation Limited, delivering high-quality dairy products to millions of households across Tamil Nadu.
points: Over 30 years of service in the dairy industry
Providing pure and nutritious milk products

servicesData.title: Our Services
servicesData.subtitle: Delivering Quality from Farm to Home

items.title: Milk Distribution
items.description: Daily supply of fresh, pure milk to homes, shops, and institutions across Tamil Nadu.

items.title: Dairy Product Sales
items.description: A wide range of products like curd, ghee, paneer, butter, ice cream, and flavored milk.

items.title: Bulk Supply to Institutions
items.description: Supplying milk and milk-based products to schools, hospitals, hotels, and government programs.

items.title: Farmer Support Services
items.description: Empowering rural dairy farmers with training, veterinary support, and fair pricing.

items.title: Cold Chain Logistics
items.description: Ensuring freshness with advanced chilling centers and refrigerated vehicles.

items.title: Retail Outlets
items.description: Access our dairy products at thousands of Aavin parlours and franchise stores.

items.name: Toned Milk
items.desc: Low-fat, nutritious milk perfect for everyday consumption.

items.name: Curd
items.desc: Thick and creamy curd made from pure milk.

items.name: Ghee
items.desc: Golden, aromatic ghee made using traditional methods.

reviews.name: Meena S.
reviews.comment: Aavin milk is always fresh and the delivery is super reliable.

reviews.name: Ravi Kumar
reviews.comment: We use Aavin curd and ghee in our restaurant – customers love the taste.

reviews.name: Divya Raj
reviews.comment: My kids love Aavin flavored milk. It's their favorite treat after school!

reviews.name: Arun Prasad
reviews.comment: Affordable and trustworthy. Aavin is part of our daily routine.

reviews.name: Priya M.
reviews.comment: I always recommend Aavin ghee to friends – it's pure and tasty.
